Title: Teenkahon
Writer: Abhinandan Banerjee (dialogue), Abhinandan Banerjee (screenplay), Bauddhayan Mukherji (dialogue and screenplay), Bauddhayan Mukherji (story), Bibhutibhushan Mukhopadhyay (story), Syed Mustafa Siraj (story)
Actors: Suman Mukhopadhyay, Kharaj Mukherjee, Ratan Sarkhel, Manasi Sinha
Plot: Teenkahon (Three Obsessions) is a triptych film in Bengali by debutant filmmaker Bauddhayan Mukherji. It is a rare international art house film from Bengal which, as a piece of social ...
